metadata.title: CVE-2021-46968 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/zcrypt: fix zcard and zqueue hot-unplug memleak Tests with kvm and akmemdebug kernel showed, that on hot unplug the zcard and zqueue structsfor the unplugged card or queue are not properly freed because of amismatch with get/put for the embedded kref counter. This fix now adjuststhe handling of the kref counters. With init the kref counter starts with1. This initial value needs to drop to zero with the unregister of the cardor queue to trigger the release and free the object.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
